    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Sets the H1 heading for the screen
      Parameters:
      title - The H1 heading to be used as the title for the screen

    • updateComboBoxes

      public void updateComboBoxes()
      Populates the "hour" and "minute" ComboBoxes w/ the appropriate options. Options are based on the company's opening/closing times, and are translated into the user's local time. This prevents users from choosing appointment times outside the company's operating hours

    • setModifyValues

      public void setModifyValues(Appointment app)
      Pre-populates the "Modify" screen with the appropriate values for the selected appointment
      Parameters:
      app - The Appointment entity whose information will be preloaded into the "Modify" screen

    • returnToApps

      public void returnToApps(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Returns to the "All Appointments" screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent associated with the user hitting a button to return to the "All Appointments" screen
      Throws:
      IOException - The Exception associated with the stage change that is thrown if the operation fails

    • saveApp

      public void saveApp(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Saves the appointment to the database
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent associated with the user hitting the "Save" button
      Throws:
      IOException - The Exception associated with saving the Appointment to the database that is thrown if the operation fails

    • errorChecking

      private String errorChecking()
      Validates user input and check for errors
      Returns:
      A String indicating whether the input is valid ("PASS") or not ("FAIL")

    • selectLocation

      public void selectLocation()
      Sets the "location" field of the "Add/Modify Appointment" screen to be the selected customer's full address
